member.name: M:classRoom.Form1.ReadData
member.summary: ReadData() reads data from CSV, slits at comma and saves to list

member.name: M:classRoom.Form1.DisplayCellData
member.summary: DisplayCellData() uses lists generated by ReadData() and uses for loop to insert data into cells

member.name: M:classRoom.Form1.ExtractCellData
member.summary: ExtractCellData() extracts data from all cells in data grid and creates new lists
member.returns: Returns fileContent string of all cell data

member.name: M:classRoom.Form1.BinarySearch(System.String)
member.summary: BinarySearch() takes a student name as input, sorts student list and uses a binary search to find mathcing student name
member.returns: Returns int which tells program if a match was found or not

member.name: M:classRoom.Form1.validateData
member.summary: validateData() validates header text fields to ensure they are have data
member.returns: true if data is valid, false if not

member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.
